page.title: 08D.B. SCHOOL.
page.content: Drakes Broughton was first a {village school,}then a first and a Middle School separately, but now they have been joined together. The present school was started to be built in 1974.It was opened by the Bishop of Worcester. There was a first school before, which was in{1865.}There were only two classes. The head used to write a diary called a log book and they found one which said that once they had{"six feet of snow".}The first school built in Drakes Broughton was one of the first schools in the country. There used to be a bell on top of the old school building. The rest was built in the 1960's. The old school was finished in 1867. First of all they had to have mobile classrooms.
